Summary: On 7-17 at 10 PM I saw two orange lights west of Phoenix.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around July 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 7-172012 at 10 PM I saw two orange lights west of Phoenix. They appeared to be many miles west of me and if it was one object it was much bigger than any plane I know of, the objects were parallel to each other. At the time I was driving west bound in my car in Mesa Arizona. The reason I noticed them is they were orange and not blinking. I have no idea what they were. They appeared to be heading west bound but I could not tell for sure because they were so far away. I know they were not heading north or south. I wea hoping to go home and ge a camera but they disappeared. I was wondering if anyone besides me saw anything that night (7-17-12)
